text:
@business HBO: We're going to ridiculously dramatize the lives of modern-day uber-wealthy in 'Succession'.

Reality: Hold my $20,000 bottle of Champagne while I hop on my private helicopter to avoid the COVID19-infected human capital stock to get to my mega-yacht.
